message: This proposal aims to split the funds in a way that allows us to both benefit significantly from the initial amount. I propose we divide it 3:2 in favor of you, Bob.
I appreciate your generous offer, Alice, but I believe we can both do better. I propose a 6:4 split in my favor, acknowledging the upcoming inflation that will benefit me more than you.
I understand your perspective, Bob. In an effort to find a fair solution, I propose a 50-50 split. This ensures equal distribution of the funds, taking into account the inflationary risk.
